pageTitle: You can only claim from a grant agreed by Access to Work
h1: You can only claim money back from a grant agreed by Access to Work
p1: Contact Access to Work if you think we've got something wrong or if you need extra support from your grant.
p2: You can contact us for free by:
relayLinkText: Relay UK, if you cannot hear or speak on the phone: 18001 then 0800 121 7479
checkYouCanUseLinkText: find out how to use the service
